<<<<<<< HEAD
A short discourse about our keeping our money shewing that our money may be kept among our selves, and yet our confederates strongly assisted, by a descent upon France. By E.L. Littleton, Edward, b. 1626.
16 p.
printed by B. Motte, and are to be sold by John Whitlock near Stationers-Hall, London : 1696.
E.L. = Edward Littleton. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
